data.text: I recently stayed at this hotel and my experience was made exceptional by the incredibly friendly and helpful staff. Sandeep, Uifat, Obaid, and Haja went above and beyond to make my stay enjoyable. A special shoutout to Sandeep for being the most helpful. The hotel itself was decent, but the outstanding service from these individuals truly made my stay memorable. Thanks to the team for their hospitality!
data.title: Exceptional Hospitality: A Shoutout to Sandeep and Team for a Memorable Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Greetings, we appreciate the time you took to share this incredible review.  We are delighted to know that our team was able to create a wonderful experience during your stay. Your recognition of our team members is truly uplifting, and they will be overjoyed to read your kind words. We eagerly await the opportunity to welcome you back again in the near future! Thanks & Regards, Signature Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Signature Hotel

data.text:
My family stayed in Signature Al Barsha hotel from the end of December till 2 January 2024. They really loved it. Very comfortable, big special room for 2 adults and one child. 
First of all receptions made very fast check inn it was morning but they found good room for my parents. Room was cozy and have everything important things inside.
Very hardworking housekeeping thanks him he was good guy and made his job very well. 2nd floor 210room. 
Very friendly all workers in hotel greetings and smiley.
Very warm atmosphere. Nice warm pool and good gym area.
Tasty breakfast. Everyday cook something new. Thanks for chef and who work in restaurant area. 
Big thankful want to tell for SHERAJUL he working on lobby I guess bellboy he so friendly, very helpful, best manners, my family and my nephew very loved him. We wish him good luck and always stay same The Best Guy !
Location very perfect! All time in Signature hotel was wonderful very recommend this hotel for all visitors! Safe and cozy!
data.title: Signature Al Barsha best hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful feedback with us! We are delighted to hear that you had a pleasant stay with your family. Our team is committed to providing excellent customer service, and we are thrilled that our team was able to make your stay wonderful. We will be sure to pass on your kind words to them. Your appreciation for us is truly encouraging. We are dedicated to creating memorable experiences for our guests, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another stay. Thanks & Regards, Signature Hotel Management.
owner_response.author: Signature Hotel

data.text: I will never return to this hotel. The facilities are old and poorly maintained. The breakfast buffet is terrible. Very bad quality-price ratio. And the worst thing is that the soundproofing of the rooms does not exist. The noise from the bar, with the music at very high volume during the night, does not allow you to rest. A horror.
data.title: Noisy

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Jariasar, we are glad to hear that you found our location and staff to be very nice. However, we apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay from the noise. We understand the importance of a peaceful and restful stay, and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please be assured that we take your feedback seriously, and we will take measures to address the noise issue to ensure a more comfortable experience for our guests in the future. We appreciate your understanding and thank you for bringing this to our attention Thanks & Regards, Signature Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Signature Hotel

data.text: The room was not up to the level of 4-star hotels, and The bathroom was terrible. The heater capacity looks like it is a four-litter tank. It isn't quiet at night because of the nightclubs on the 1st floor. You can smell bad smells from the reception until you reach your room. Unless you are on a very limited budget, don't take this hotel as a choice.
data.title: Poor

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Greetings from Signature Hotel, shadi a. We are truly saddened that your experience was not as great as we would have liked. We regret to hear that you faced such issues during your stay with us. We are sad to see your negative review and we would like to know more behind it. Please let us know how we can reach you here: fdbck.me/i/6546620 Thanks & Regards, Signature Hotel
owner_response.author: Signature Hotel

data.text:
The worst hotel! Fleas in beds 🤯and bad smell in the room.
I changed rooms 3 times! In all, the terrible smell ,air conditioners do not work, but the worst thing in beds is fleas ...🤯🤯🤯 The woman on reception is rude and absolutely did not try to solve this situation!NOT RECOMMENDED
data.title: Fleas in beds!!!!horrible smell in the rooms.NOT RECOMENDED

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Greetings from Signature 1 Hotel, Tanya. We are truly saddened that your experience was not as great as we would have liked. We regret to hear that you faced such issues during your stay with us. We do our best to ensure that all guests’ requests are attended promptly and effectively, and we are very sorry that on this occasion we did not meet your expectation. We will investigate into the matter and ensure this kind of actions are not repeated in the future. Please let us know how we can reach you here: fdbck.me/i/6416465 Thanks & Regards, Signature Hotel Management
